response.overview: After a year apart - attending different schools, meeting different people - the guys rent a beach house and vow to make this the best summer ever. As it turns out, whether that will happen or not has a lot to do with the girls. Between the wild parties, outrageous revelations and yes, a trip to band camp, they discover that times change and people change, but in the end, it's all about sticking together.
response.tagline: This summer it's all about sticking together.
response.title: American Pie 2

titles.title: American pie 2: Tu segunda vez es mejor
American Pie 2 - La segunda vez es mejor
